name: n0tice
description: The n0tice API provides a rich feature set for software development. All of the n0tice products are built using our own developer tools and services.

apis.name: n0tice
apis.description: The n0tice APIs require no key. simply select the endpoint and parameters that return what you want and start building. The n0tice web site and iPhone app are built using the same API. it includes a wide range of features for tuning precisely the results you want. Every post is geotagged, so you can easily build a range of location-basedservices using content posted by users to n0tice. n0tice aspires to be an open platform for sharing local knowledge.  To us, that means that at our core we are a utility and a service for our customers, our partners and the public.
